LanguageData.Oven_Frame.label: 烤爐 (建造中)
LanguageData.Oven_Frame.description: A stone oven used for baking.
LanguageData.HandCanningstove.label: 食物加工台（燃料）
LanguageData.HandCanningstove.description: 用於壓榨和處理食物的手動工作台。製作簡單的物品。工作效率只有電動的40%
LanguageData.HandCanningstove_Blueprint.label: 食物加工台（燃料） (藍圖)
LanguageData.HandCanningstove_Frame.label: 食物加工台（燃料） (建造中)
LanguageData.HandCanningstove_Frame.description: An unpowered version of the canning stove, food press, and prep table. Makes simple items. Requires 40% work to make items here.
LanguageData.Canningstove.label: 食物加工台（電動）
LanguageData.Canningstove.description: 用於壓榨和處理食物的電動工作台。
LanguageData.Canningstove_Blueprint.label: 食物加工台（電動） (藍圖)
LanguageData.Canningstove_Frame.label: 食物加工台（電動） (建造中)
LanguageData.Canningstove_Frame.description: An electric canning stove, food press, and prep table.

LanguageData.CookingTools.label: 烹飪工具櫃
LanguageData.CookingTools.description: 提高工作效率15%。需要放置在爐灶等烹飪類工作台旁。可加速周圍的所有烹飪工作台。
LanguageData.CookingTools_Blueprint.label: 烹飪工具櫃 (藍圖)
LanguageData.CookingTools_Blueprint_Install.label: 烹飪工具櫃 (藍圖)
LanguageData.CookingTools_Frame.label: 烹飪工具櫃 (建造中)
LanguageData.CookingTools_Frame.description: Increases work speed 14%. Needs to be placed near cooking tops. Will boost the cook speed of all tables near by.
LanguageData.Outdoorlight.label: 戶外燈
LanguageData.Outdoorlight.description: 可以抵禦各種惡劣天氣的光源。
LanguageData.Outdoorlight_Blueprint.label: 戶外燈 (藍圖)
LanguageData.Outdoorlight_Frame.label: 戶外燈 (建造中)
LanguageData.Outdoorlight_Frame.description: A light source which is weather proof.
LanguageData.GrindStone.label: 石磨
LanguageData.GrindStone.description: 用於快速研磨植物原料的手動小型石磨。
LanguageData.GrindStone_Blueprint.label: 石磨 (藍圖)
LanguageData.GrindStone_Frame.label: 石磨 (建造中)
LanguageData.GrindStone_Frame.description: A small muscle-powered grinding stone for quickly grinding raw plants.
LanguageData.TableLoom.label: 紡織機
LanguageData.TableLoom.description: 用於將纖維原料紡織成布匹的工作台。

LanguageData.TableLoom_Frame.label: 紡織機 (建造中)
LanguageData.TableLoom_Frame.description: A tailor's table used to spin raw materials into usable cloth.
